event.description: Ian Kinsler walks.
With Omar Vizquel batting, Ian Kinsler steals (8) 2nd base.
Omar Vizquel singles on a ground ball to center fielder Brent Lillibridge. Ian Kinsler scores.
Michael Young flies out to center fielder Brent Lillibridge.
With Andruw Jones batting, Omar Vizquel steals (1) 2nd base.
Andruw Jones walks.
Marlon Byrd grounds into a double play, second baseman Chris Getz to shortstop Jayson Nix to first baseman Paul Konerko. Andruw Jones out at 2nd.
Nelson Cruz strikes out swinging.
David Murphy reaches on a throwing error by third baseman Josh Fields.
Chris Davis singles on a fly ball to right fielder Jermaine Dye. David Murphy to 2nd.
Taylor Teagarden singles on a ground ball to left fielder Carlos Quentin. David Murphy to 3rd. Chris Davis to 2nd.
Ian Kinsler grounds into a force out, shortstop Jayson Nix to second baseman Chris Getz. David Murphy scores. Chris Davis to 3rd. Taylor Teagarden out at 2nd. Ian Kinsler to 1st.
With Omar Vizquel batting, wild pitch by Jose Contreras, Chris Davis scores. Ian Kinsler to 2nd.
Omar Vizquel pops out to third baseman Josh Fields in foul territory.
Michael Young pops out to second baseman Chris Getz in foul territory.
Andruw Jones flies out to right fielder Jermaine Dye.
Marlon Byrd doubles (12) on a line drive to left fielder Carlos Quentin.
Nelson Cruz strikes out swinging.
David Murphy doubles (3) on a fly ball to left fielder Carlos Quentin.
With Chris Davis batting, wild pitch by Jose Contreras, David Murphy to 3rd.
Chris Davis strikes out swinging.
Taylor Teagarden hit by pitch.
Ian Kinsler out on a sacrifice bunt, third baseman Josh Fields to first baseman Paul Konerko. David Murphy scores. Taylor Teagarden to 2nd.
Omar Vizquel doubles (3) on a line drive to right fielder Jermaine Dye. Taylor Teagarden scores.
Pitching Change: D. J. Carrasco replaces Jose Contreras.
Michael Young strikes out on a foul tip.
Andruw Jones grounds out, third baseman Josh Fields to first baseman Paul Konerko.
Marlon Byrd strikes out swinging.
Nelson Cruz called out on strikes.
Texas Rangers first baseman Michael Young left the game due to an injured back.
David Murphy singles on a ground ball to right fielder Jermaine Dye.
With Chris Davis batting, wild pitch by D. J. Carrasco, David Murphy to 2nd.
Chris Davis strikes out swinging.
Taylor Teagarden doubles (1) on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Carlos Quentin. David Murphy scores.
Ian Kinsler singles on a fly ball to left fielder Carlos Quentin. Taylor Teagarden to 3rd.
Omar Vizquel pops out to second baseman Chris Getz.
Elvis Andrus grounds out, second baseman Chris Getz to first baseman Paul Konerko.
Andruw Jones singles on a ground ball to left fielder Carlos Quentin.
Marlon Byrd flies out to left fielder Carlos Quentin.
Nelson Cruz strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Clayton Richard replaces D. J. Carrasco.
David Murphy grounds out, shortstop Jayson Nix to first baseman Paul Konerko.
Chris Davis strikes out swinging.
Taylor Teagarden strikes out swinging.
Ian Kinsler strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Lance Broadway replaces Clayton Richard.
Omar Vizquel grounds out, pitcher Lance Broadway to first baseman Paul Konerko.
Elvis Andrus singles on a fly ball to right fielder Jermaine Dye.
Andruw Jones walks. Elvis Andrus to 2nd.
Marlon Byrd grounds into a force out, third baseman Josh Fields to second baseman Chris Getz. Elvis Andrus to 3rd. Andruw Jones out at 2nd. Marlon Byrd to 1st.
Nelson Cruz flies out to right fielder Jermaine Dye.
Chris Getz grounds out, second baseman Ian Kinsler to first baseman Chris Davis.
Josh Fields singles on a ground ball to right fielder Nelson Cruz.
Carlos Quentin strikes out swinging and Josh Fields caught stealing 2nd, catcher Taylor Teagarden to second baseman Ian Kinsler to first baseman Chris Davis to shortstop Omar Vizquel.
Jim Thome strikes out on a foul tip.
Jermaine Dye singles on a ground ball to left fielder David Murphy.
Paul Konerko flies out to center fielder Marlon Byrd.
A. J. Pierzynski grounds out softly, second baseman Ian Kinsler to first baseman Chris Davis.
Jayson Nix flies out to left fielder David Murphy.
Brent Lillibridge lines out to right fielder Nelson Cruz.
Chris Getz grounds out, second baseman Ian Kinsler to first baseman Chris Davis.
Josh Fields grounds out, pitcher Matt Harrison to first baseman Chris Davis.
Carlos Quentin flies out to center fielder Marlon Byrd.
Jim Thome grounds out to first baseman Chris Davis.
Defensive switch from shortstop to third base for Omar Vizquel.
Defensive Substitution: Elvis Andrus replaces third baseman Michael Young, batting 3rd, playing shortstop.
Jermaine Dye called out on strikes.
Paul Konerko pops out to second baseman Ian Kinsler.
A. J. Pierzynski grounds out, second baseman Ian Kinsler to first baseman Chris Davis.
Jayson Nix walks.
Brent Lillibridge called out on strikes.
Chris Getz singles on a fly ball to right fielder Nelson Cruz. Jayson Nix to 2nd.
Josh Fields grounds into a double play, third baseman Omar Vizquel to second baseman Ian Kinsler to first baseman Chris Davis. Chris Getz out at 2nd.
Carlos Quentin flies out to left fielder David Murphy.
Jim Thome grounds out, second baseman Ian Kinsler to first baseman Chris Davis.
Jermaine Dye flies out to right fielder Nelson Cruz.

Jayson Nix flies out to left fielder David Murphy.
